Description: Pottery ostracon with part of one incised line - Coptic (?), from the rim of a vessel, part of rim painted black on inside with two white circles, inside body painted with one white oval and two black curves.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell & J. Faiers
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394073) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394073)
